snippet.title: Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Listen in as Michelle Rocha from developer Luminawesome Games talks you through Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles! Head to the underwater-like neon world of The Great Depths filled with all sorts of shapes, colours and underwater inhabitants while exploring as the squishy hero, Lumote. Lumote must possess, jump, and think its way through a world of puzzles. To aid in the quest, Lumote’s ability to possess Motes will help reach areas not normally accessible. For every puzzle Lumote completes opening flower gates, it is one step closer to finding Mastermote!  Coming to Nintendo Switch, PC, Xbox, Google Stadia and PlayStation 4 March 24th 2022.

Wishlist now on:

STEAM: https://wired.gg/Lumote/Steam            
GOG: https://wired.gg/Lumote/GOG
EPIC: https://wired.gg/Lumote/Epic

Pick up a physical copy from the Wired Store:

Nintendo Switch: https://wired.gg/Lumote/Switch
PlayStation 4: https://wired.gg/Lumote/PS4

Follow: 

Wired Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/WiredP​​
Wired Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WiredPro​​
Wired Productions Discord : https://discord.gg/wiredp​
Wired Productions Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/wired_productions/

#Lumote #PlayStation #NintendoSwitch #Xbox #GoogleStadia
